column4: I don't see why it would not work, but I havn't set that up myself
I'd recommend posting the question to ubuntu forums. someone can either gives the steps necessary or point to a guide, but what you are describing is more than a a click process

thanks for the advice. I was hoping that 9.04 would potentially have this automatically done just as 8.10 did with dual monitors on a single graphics card. i guess that was wishful thinking. i will head over to the forums.
It is a little 'out of the norm', which means it is a setup that ubuntu isn't just going to automatically look for and setup. Be nice if it would  :)
